original: 我們的據點和武將數量逐漸增加，是時候任命輔臣協助大哥執行內政任務了。輔臣能在平常自主地派出武將執行任務。
text: The number of our strongholds and generals is gradually increasing. It is time to appoint auxiliary ministers to assist the eldest brother in carrying out internal affairs tasks. Auxiliary ministers can dispatch generals on their own to perform tasks.
